update SYS_APP_USERS

mapper.select: SELECT ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATOR_NAME, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM SYS_SCENIC_ATTENDANCE_TIME WHERE STATUS != 1 ORDER BY START_DATE ASC

select a.*, b.USER_NAME, b.EMPLOYEE_POST, -- 打卡景区 c.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME from SYS_APP_PEOPLE_ATTENDANCE a left join SYS_APP_USERS b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT c on a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = c.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
and a.USER_ID = #{userId}
and a.WORK_TIME >= CAST(CONCAT(#{startDate}) AS datetime)
and a.WORK_TIME <= CAST(CONCAT(#{endDate}) AS datetime)

select a.TYPE,a.RECORD_ID,a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID,c.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME,b.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME,a.USER_ID,b.USER_NAME,a.EMPLOYEE_POST,a.WORK_TIME,a.WORK_PHOTO,a.WORK_PLACE,a.EMPLOYEE_TYPE from SYS_APP_USERS b left join ( select TYPE,RECORD_ID,SCENIC_SPOT_ID,USER_ID,EMPLOYEE_POST,WORK_TIME,WORK_PHOTO,WORK_PLACE,EMPLOYEE_TYPE from SYS_APP_PEOPLE_ATTENDANCE
and WORK_TIME >= CAST(CONCAT(#{startDate}) AS datetime)
and WORK_TIME <= CAST(CONCAT(#{endDate}) AS datetime)
) a on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT c on a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = c.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
and b.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and a.RECORD_ID is null
and a.RECORD_ID is not null

select a.TYPE,a.RECORD_ID,a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID,c.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME,a.USER_ID,b.USER_NAME,a.EMPLOYEE_POST,a.WORK_TIME,a.WORK_PHOTO,a.WORK_PLACE,a.EMPLOYEE_TYPE from SYS_APP_USERS b left join ( select TYPE,RECORD_ID,SCENIC_SPOT_ID,USER_ID,EMPLOYEE_POST,WORK_TIME,WORK_PHOTO,WORK_PLACE,EMPLOYEE_TYPE from SYS_APP_PEOPLE_ATTENDANCE
DATEDIFF(WORK_TIME,NOW())=0 ) a on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT c on a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = c.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
and b.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and RECORD_ID is null
and RECORD_ID is not null

select b.RECORD_ID,b.ROBOT_START_TIME,b.ROBOT_POSITION,a.CLIENT_VERSION,a.ROBOT_CODE,a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID,c.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME from SYS_ROBOT a left join (select RECORD_ID,ROBOT_CODE,ROBOT_START_TIME,ROBOT_POSITION from SYS_APP_ROBOT_ATTENDANCE
and ROBOT_START_TIME >= CAST(CONCAT(#{startDate},' 00:00:00') AS datetime)
and ROBOT_START_TIME <= CAST(CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AS datetime)
) b on a.ROBOT_CODE = b.ROBOT_CODE left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT c on a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = c.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
and a.ROBOT_CODE = #{robotCode}
and b.RECORD_ID is not null
and b.RECORD_ID is null

select b.RECORD_ID, b.ROBOT_START_TIME, b.ROBOT_POSITION, a.CLIENT_VERSION, a.ROBOT_CODE, a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID, c.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME from SYS_ROBOT a left join (select RECORD_ID, ROBOT_CODE, ROBOT_START_TIME, ROBOT_POSITION from SYS_APP_ROBOT_ATTENDANCE
DATEDIFF(ROBOT_START_TIME,NOW())=0 ) b on a.ROBOT_CODE = b.ROBOT_CODE left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT c on a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = c.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
and a.ROBOT_CODE = #{robotCode}
and b.RECORD_ID is not null
and b.RECORD_ID is null
